languages.text: {n}{petname} взирает на вас алыми визорами. Вы и сами знаете, что кибермастиф — это орудие для отправления воли Его, а не личный товарищ. Впрочем, как и верный болтер, даже к инструменту можно относиться с симпатией.{/n}

{n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} взирает на вас алыми визорами. Вы и сами знаете, что кибермастиф — это орудие для отправления воли Его, а не личный товарищ. Впрочем, как и верный болтер, даже к инструменту можно относиться с симпатией.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade. Nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

{n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade. Nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

{n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

{n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

{n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

{n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}の赤いバイザーがあなたの方を向いた。サイバーマスチフが仲間ではなく、陛下の意志を遂行するための道具であることは重々承知している。それでも、信頼できるボルターに愛着を抱くように、道具にも情を注ぐことはできる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}の赤いバイザーがあなたの方を向いた。サイバーマスチフが仲間ではなく、陛下の意志を遂行するための道具であることは重々承知している。それでも、信頼できるボルターに愛着を抱くように、道具にも情を注ぐことはできる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die roten Visoren von {petname} wenden sich dir zu. Du weißt genau, dass ein Cyber-Mastiff ein Instrument Seines Willens ist, kein Gefährte. Aber so wie man einen zuverlässigen Bolter mögen kann, so kann man auch einem Instrument Sympathie entgegenbringen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die roten Visoren von {petname} wenden sich dir zu. Du weißt genau, dass ein Cyber-Mastiff ein Instrument Seines Willens ist, kein Gefährte. Aber so wie man einen zuverlässigen Bolter mögen kann, so kann man auch einem Instrument Sympathie entgegenbringen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les visières écarlates de {petname} se tournent vers vous. Vous avez parfaitement conscience qu'un cyber-mastiff n'est pas un camarade, mais simplement l'instrument de Sa volonté. Cependant, tout comme un soldat peut nourrir une affection pour son bolter, un tel outil est susceptible d'attirer une certaine sympathie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les visières écarlates de {petname} se tournent vers vous. Vous avez parfaitement conscience qu'un cyber-mastiff n'est pas un camarade, mais simplement l'instrument de Sa volonté. Cependant, tout comme un soldat peut nourrir une affection pour son bolter, un tel outil est susceptible d'attirer une certaine sympathie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los visores rojos de {petname} se vuelven hacia ti. Sabes perfectamente que un cibermastín es un instrumento de Su voluntad, no un camarada; pese a ello, igual que le tendrías apego a tu bólter favorito, también puedes sentir simpatía por un instrumento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los visores rojos de {petname} se vuelven hacia ti. Sabes perfectamente que un cibermastín es un instrumento de Su voluntad, no un camarada; pese a ello, igual que le tendrías apego a tu bólter favorito, también puedes sentir simpatía por un instrumento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}将红色的面甲转向了你。你很清楚，生化獒犬并不是你的同伴，而是行使帝皇意志的工具。但即便如此，你依然对这件工具产生了感情，就像某些人可能会喜欢上自己最信任的爆矢枪一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}将红色的面甲转向了你。你很清楚，生化獒犬并不是你的同伴，而是行使帝皇意志的工具。但即便如此，你依然对这件工具产生了感情，就像某些人可能会喜欢上自己最信任的爆矢枪一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} kızıl vizörlerini sana dikiyor. Siber mastifin O'nun iradesinin aracı olduğunun farkındasın, ahbabın olamayacak bir yaratık o. Buna rağmen insan sadık bulonatarına zamanla nasıl bağlanıyorsa, bir araca da şefkat gösterilebilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname}'s red visors turn to you. You know full well that a cyber-mastiff is an instrument of His will, not a comrade; nevertheless, just as one can grow fond of one's trusted bolter, so too can an instrument be shown sympathy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} kızıl vizörlerini sana dikiyor. Siber mastifin O'nun iradesinin aracı olduğunun farkındasın, ahbabın olamayacak bir yaratık o. Buna rağmen insan sadık bulonatarına zamanla nasıl bağlanıyorsa, bir araca da şefkat gösterilebilir.{/n}
